name: Bishoujo Variety Game: Rapyulus Panic
overview: The world of Rapyulus is one not unlike our own, except that if you wish to ask something of someone, you must defeat them in a game first. Rapyulus has always been a peaceful land, but recently strange things have been happening, and it's suspected that something may have happened to the goddess who watches over the land. A young man as recently come to Rapyulus, and it's up to him to figure out just what's going on and save this land from evil... but if he's going to get any help, he'll need to win a lot of games! Bishōjo Variety Game: Rapyulus Panic is a mini-game collection featuring a cast of cute anime girls. The story mode consists of four themed areas each with three minigames -- and three girls to challenge -- for 12 games in total. Minigames include casino games like roulette and blackjack, jigsaw and sliding tile puzzles, spot-the-difference games, and even action challenges such as shooting incoming asteroids with a space ship. There is also a free game mode where any mini-games unlocked through the story mode can be freely replayed.
